shortdesc.ph: States of the last-mile network probe test.

plentry.pd: 1: The last-mile network probe test is complete.
2: The last-mile network probe test is incomplete because the bandwidth estimation is not available due to limited test resources. 一个可能的原因是测试资源暂时受限。
3: The last-mile network probe test is not carried out, probably due to poor network conditions. 一个可能的原因是网络连接中断。
